title: Jesse Ventura | Biography & Facts | Britannica
snippet: Citing political infighting and poor leadership, Ventura left the Reform Party in 2000 and subsequently joined the Independence Party. He decided not seek a second term as governor.

title: Jesse Ventura considering run for president as independent
snippet: He left that party in 2000 to join the Independence Party of Minnesota. Ventura, who has a program on Russia Today, floated the possibility of running for president as a Libertarian in 2016, but ultimately did not do so.
